title: Onboard a New Property for Management
description: A property management company is taking over management of a new apartment building.

tasks.description: Collect all necessary documents from the property owner, including existing leases, tenant contact information, and vendor contracts.
tasks.expected_outcome: All required property and tenant data is collected.

tasks.description: Set up the new property, units, and tenants in the property management software.
tasks.expected_outcome: The property is fully and accurately set up in the system.

tasks.description: Send an introductory letter to all existing tenants informing them of the change in management and new procedures for paying rent and requesting maintenance.
tasks.expected_outcome: All tenants are successfully notified of the management change.
